scripts.build: wp-scripts build --config webpack.config.js && gulp build:pro && npm run translate
scripts.build:free: wp-scripts build --config webpack.config.js && gulp build:free && npm run translate
scripts.lint:alert: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/alert && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/alert --fix
scripts.lint:pr-content: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/pr-content/ && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/pr-content/ --fix
scripts.lint:faq2: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/faq2 && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/faq2 --fix
scripts.lint:faq2-q: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/faq2-q && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/faq2-q --fix
scripts.lint:faq2-a: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/faq2-a && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/faq2-a --fix
scripts.lint:balloon: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/balloon && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/balloon --fix
scripts.lint:faq: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/faq && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/faq --fix
scripts.lint:animation: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/_pro/animation && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/_pro/animation --fix
scripts.lint:page-content: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/page-content && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/page-content --fix
scripts.lint:flow: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/flow && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/flow --fix
scripts.lint:post-list: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/_pro/post-list && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/_pro/post-list --fix
scripts.lint:child-page: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/_pro/child-page && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/_pro/child-page --fix
scripts.lint:border-box: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/border-box && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/border-box --fix
scripts.lint:spacer: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/spacer && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/spacer --fix
scripts.lint:button: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/button && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/button --fix
scripts.lint:pr-blocks: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/pr-blocks/ && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/pr-blocks/ --fix
scripts.lint:timeline: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/_pro/timeline && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/_pro/timeline --fix
scripts.lint:timeline-item: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/_pro/timeline-item && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/_pro/timeline-item --fix
scripts.lint:advanced-unit-control: wp-scripts format-js src/components/advanced-unit-control && wp-scripts lint-js src/components/advanced-unit-control
scripts.lint:advanced-viewport-control: wp-scripts format-js src/components/advanced-viewport-control && wp-scripts lint-js src/components/advanced-viewport-control
scripts.lint:utils: wp-scripts format-js src/utils && wp-scripts lint-js src/utils --fix
scripts.fixtures:regenerate: npm run build && npm run fixtures:clean && npm run fixtures:generate
